programme.title: BKFC 48
programme.desc: From Aug. 11, 2023. Features John Dodson vs. JR Ridge for inaugural BKFC flyweight title, plus Keith Richardson vs. Derek Perez in bare-knuckle boxing action from Albuquerque, New Mexico.

programme.title: GLORY Kickboxing
programme.desc: Professional kickboxing from Rotterdam, Netherlands, featuring the single-night light heavyweight tournament with Donegi Abena, Tarik Khbabez, Bogdan Stoica, and more.

programme.title: BKFC 48
programme.desc: From Aug. 11, 2023. Features John Dodson vs. JR Ridge for inaugural BKFC flyweight title, plus Keith Richardson vs. Derek Perez in bare-knuckle boxing action from Albuquerque, New Mexico.

programme.title: GLORY 95
programme.desc: From Zagreb, Croatia, featuring Levi Ritgers vs. Bahram Rajabzadeh in heavyweight title eliminator, plus Hamicha vs. Cedric Do in welterweight action. From Sept. 21, 2024.

programme.title: The Daily Tip
programme.desc: Early Betting Tips to Give You The Edge. Your first source for the day's angles, hot takes, analysis and more with hosts Michael Jenkins and Chelsa Messinger. Weekdays from 6am-9am ET.

programme.title: Bet Sweats
programme.desc: Featuring two of the sharpest bettors in the game, Joe Ostrowski and Sam Panayotovich bring unmatched expertise. This show is a can't-miss for any sports or betting fan looking for actionable insights, bold predictions, and high-stakes entertainment.

programme.title: Coach and Company
programme.desc: Jonathan Coachman hosts this no-holds-barred daily sports talk show. "The Coach" leads dynamic discussions with a rotating cast of all-star analysts and sports insiders.

programme.title: Professional Fighters League
programme.desc: From April 18, 2025 at Universal Studios in Orlando, Fla.

programme.title: Bellator Champions Series: Belfast
programme.desc: Brazilian Patrício Pitbull defends the Bellator world featherweight title against Canadian Jeremy Kennedy in the first of two title fights at the mixed martial arts event held at the SSE Arena, in Belfast, Northern Ireland.

programme.title: Bellator Champions Series: Dublin
programme.desc: Jason Jackson vs. Ramazan Kuramagomedov, welterweight; Paul Hughes vs. Bobby King, lightweight; Sinead Kavanagh vs. Arlene Blencowe, women's featherweight; Norbert Növényi Jr. vs. Dalton Rosta; Kasum Kasumov vs. Matheus Mattos. From 3Arena in Dublin.

programme.title: GLORY: Collision 7
programme.desc: Features Rico Verhoeven vs. Levi Ritgers for heavyweight title, plus Tarik Khbabez vs. Donegi Abena rematch for the light heavyweight belt in kickboxing action from Arnhem, Netherlands. From Dec. 7, 2024.

programme.title: BKFC 43
programme.desc: From Libery First Arena in Omaha, Neb. on May 19, 2023.

programme.title: BKFC 62
programme.desc: Kai Stewart vs. Bryan Duran, featherweight title bout; Keith Richardson vs. Alberto Blas, championship bout; Jared Warren vs. Jomi Escoboza, light heavyweight title bout. From Hollywood, Fla.

programme.title: Stadium
programme.desc: Stadium is the original multi-platform sports network featuring exclusive live and on-demand games and events, extensive highlights, classic games, original programming, and daily live studio programming.
